statements: SELECT * FROM income_data_table;
SELECT area_name, income_amount FROM income_data_table WHERE poverty_status = TRUE;
SELECT id, area_name FROM income_data_table ORDER BY area_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM income_data_table WHERE income_amount > 50000;
SELECT area_name, income_amount, poverty_status FROM income_data_table WHERE income_amount < 30000 ORDER BY area_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM income_data_table ORDER BY area_name DESC, income_amount ASC;
SELECT area_name, SUM(income_amount) AS total_income FROM income_data_table WHERE poverty_status = TRUE GROUP BY area_name ORDER BY total_income DESC;
SELECT area_name, AVG(income_amount) AS average_income FROM income_data_table WHERE income_amount > 50000 GROUP BY area_name ORDER BY average_income DESC;
SELECT id, area_name, CASE WHEN poverty_status = TRUE THEN 'Below Poverty Line' ELSE 'Above Poverty Line' END AS poverty_category FROM income_data_table;
SELECT * FROM income_data_table WHERE income_amount BETWEEN 30000 AND 70000 ORDER BY income_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM income_data WHERE location_id = 1
SELECT income_amount, location_id FROM income_data WHERE income_amount > 5000
SELECT poverty_rate FROM poverty_areas WHERE area_id BETWEEN 1 AND 10
SELECT location_id, income_category FROM income_data ORDER BY income_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM poverty_areas WHERE poverty_rate < 5
SELECT * FROM income_data WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT location_id, income_amount FROM income_data ORDER BY income_amount DESC;
SELECT area_id, location_id, poverty_rate FROM poverty_areas WHERE poverty_rate > 0.5;
SELECT income_category, SUM(income_amount) AS total_income FROM income_data GROUP BY income_category;

SELECT income_data.location_id, AVG(poverty_rate) AS avg_poverty_rate FROM income_data INNER JOIN poverty_areas ON income_data.location_id = poverty_areas.location_id GROUP BY income_data.location_id;
SELECT * FROM income_data;
SELECT area_id, income_amount FROM income_data ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT area_id, area_name FROM poverty_areas WHERE poverty_rate > 10;
SELECT * FROM analysis_results WHERE area_id = 5;
SELECT result_id, analysis_date, analysis_description FROM analysis_results ORDER BY analysis_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM income_data WHERE year = 2020 ORDER BY income_amount DESC;
SELECT area_name, poverty_rate FROM poverty_areas WHERE poverty_rate > 10 ORDER BY area_name ASC;

SELECT r.analysis_description, p.area_name, i.income_amount FROM analysis_results r JOIN income_data i ON r.area_id = i.area_id JOIN poverty_areas p ON i.area_id = p.area_id WHERE r.analysis_date = '2021-01-01' ORDER BY i.income_amount DESC;
SELECT area_id, COUNT(*) AS analysis_count FROM analysis_results GROUP BY area_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY analysis_count DESC;
SELECT AVG(poverty_rate) AS avg_poverty_rate, MAX(income_amount) AS max_income FROM poverty_areas pa JOIN income_data id ON pa.area_id = id.area_id WHERE pa.poverty_rate < 15 AND id.year = 2019;
SELECT id, area_name, income_amount, poverty_status FROM income_data;
SELECT area_name, income_amount FROM income_data WHERE poverty_status = true;
SELECT * FROM income_data ORDER BY income_amount DESC;
SELECT area_name, SUM(income_amount) AS total_income FROM income_data GROUP BY area_name;
SELECT * FROM income_data WHERE income_amount > 50000;
SELECT * FROM income_data WHERE income_amount > 50000 ORDER BY area_name DESC;
SELECT area_name, income_amount FROM income_data WHERE poverty_status = TRUE ORDER BY income_amount DESC;
SELECT id, area_name FROM income_data WHERE income_amount < 30000 AND poverty_status = FALSE ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM income_data WHERE area_name LIKE 'C%' ORDER BY income_amount ASC;
SELECT area_name, SUM(income_amount) AS total_income FROM income_data GROUP BY area_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_income DESC;
SELECT * FROM income_data ORDER BY income_amount DESC;
SELECT region, poverty_rate FROM income_data WHERE poverty_rate > 10;
SELECT region, median_age FROM demographics_data WHERE region = 'East';
SELECT aid_type, SUM(aid_amount) AS total_amount FROM government_aid GROUP BY aid_type;
SELECT region, road_condition, access_to_utilities FROM infrastructure WHERE access_to_utilities = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM income_data WHERE income_amount > 50000 ORDER BY region ASC
SELECT region, poverty_rate FROM income_data INNER JOIN demographics_data ON income_data.region = demographics_data.region WHERE population > 100000 ORDER BY poverty_rate DESC
SELECT region, poverty_level, classification_date FROM poverty_classification WHERE classification_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY region ASC
SELECT region, aid_type, aid_amount FROM government_aid WHERE aid_amount < 5000 ORDER BY aid_amount DESC
SELECT region, road_condition, access_to_utilities FROM infrastructure WHERE road_condition = 'Poor' OR access_to_utilities = FALSE ORDER BY region ASC
